whoami

Hey there! I'm annie! At least, that's what my machine tells me.

I'm a graduate student in Computer Science at the University of Utah, working with Dr. Vivek Srikumar. I'm currently working on a domain specific language with Dr. Vivek Srikumar, Dr. Matthew Flatt & Dr. Jonathon Cohen that lets psychologists express constraints about their experiments, and solves these constraints. In the past I've also dabbled in research in data visualization with Dr. Alex Lex, matrix analysis with Dr. Charles Johnson, and astronomy with Dr. Adam Bolton.

I attended the Recurse Center in Summer 2016, and have nothing but nice things to say about RC. If you've been thinking about applying, you should do it!
